articles.title: 2024 solar eclipse time: When is it visible in your area? - USA TODAY
articles.description: On Monday, millions of Americans will be in the path of totality for the 2024 solar eclipse. Here's what time you can expect to see it.
articles.content:
On Monday, April 8, the sky will momentarily darken for millions of Americans in the path of totality during the 2024 solar eclipse.
